nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -123,9 +138,25 @@ Not all events will have values for all tokens, and some refer specifically to i
     The operator instructions for the event.
 `%mouseovertext%`::
     The mouse over text for the event.
+`%tticketid%`::
+    The trouble ticket id associated with the event, if available.

nodes.bodyText: Having the comma is better (but optional), but since most of the other instances of "if available" do not use the comma, I removed this one to be consistent with the other ones, rather than correcting the ones that didn't have a comma. :-)
